name: Counterattack
description: Counters with a Regular Attack any offensive action taken against the character by an adjacent unit.

name: Thorns
description: Grants {icon-Thorns.png}Thorns to the character after being targeted by any damaging offensive action.

name: Evade Attack
description: Character always evades any Regular Attack.

name: Evade Skill
description: Character always evades any Skill.

name: Critical: Rebirth
description: Grants {icon-Rebirth.png}Rebirth to the character when HP is Critical after taking damage.

name: Critical: Mirage
description: Grants {icon-Mirage.png}Mirage to the character when HP is Critical after taking damage.

name: Evade Attack
description: Character always evades any Regular Attack.

name: Countershot
description: Counters with a Regular Attack any ranged Regular Attack or Skill taken against the character.

name: Steal
description: Counters any offensive action taken on the character by an adjacent unit by attempting to steal a Component (enemies using this counter will steal an item instead).

name: Teleport Other
description: Counters any offensive action taken on the character by an adjacent unit by teleporting the offender to a random location on dry land on the map.

name: Critical: Quicken
description: Grants the character an immediate turn when HP is Critical after taking damage.

name: Renew
description: Grants {icon-Renew.png}Renew to the character after being targeted by any damaging offensive action.

name: Mystic Shield
description: As long as the character has any MP when taking damage, the whole damage is negated. Damage taken will lower current MP.

name: Root
description: Counters any offensive action taken on the character by afflicting the offender with {icon-Root.png}Root.

name: Barrier
description: Grants {icon-Barrier.png}Barrier to the character after being targeted by any damaging offensive action.

name: Magic
description: Counters any damaging offensive Spell cast on the character by casting a non-elemental version of that spell back at the attacker.

name: Adaptive Affinity
description: When the character is dealt elemental damage, they gain a buff that increases their own damage output by .35x with that Element.

name: Evade Magic
description: Character always evades any Spells.

name: Haste
description: Grants {icon-Haste.png}Haste to the character after being targeted by any damaging offensive action.

name: Fleet of Foot
description: Grants {icon-FleetofFoot.png}Fleet of Foot to the character and removes {icon-Root.png}Root after being targeted by any damaging offensive action.

name: Absorb Mana
description: When character is targeted by any offensive Ability that has an MP cost, they gain the same amount of MP that was used. Only triggers if the offensive Ability would do damage to the target.

name: Cripple
description: Counters any offensive action taken on the character by afflicting the offender with {icon-Cripple.png}Cripple.

name: Cripple
description: Counters any offensive action taken on the character by afflicting the offender with {icon-Cripple.png}Cripple.

name: Poison
description: Counters any offensive action taken on the character by afflicting the offender with {icon-Poison.png}Poison.

name: Hallowed Soul
description: When the character is dealt elemental damage, they gain a buff that increases their defense against that Element.

name: Total Shield
description: Grants {icon-DEFUp.png}DEF Up, {icon-RESUp.png}RES Up to the character after being targeted by any damaging offensive action.

name: Total Shield
description: Grants {icon-DEFUp.png}DEF Up, {icon-RESUp.png}RES Up to the character after being targeted by any damaging offensive action.

name: Slow
description: Counters any offensive action taken on the character by afflicting the offender with {icon-Slow.png}Slow.

name: Weaken
description: Counters any offensive action taken on the character by afflicting the offender with {icon-Weaken.png}Weaken.

name: Mute
description: Counters any offensive action taken on the character by afflicting the offender with {icon-Mute.png}Mute.

name: Mute
description: Counters any offensive action taken on the character by afflicting the offender with {icon-Mute.png}Mute.

name: Bleed
description: Counters any offensive action taken on the character by afflicting the offender with {icon-Bleed.png}Bleed.

name: Pounce
description: Counters any offensive action taken on the character by an adjacent unit by trying to jump next to the unit and attacking them with a weaker Regular Attack. Doesn't trigger if the character is underwater.
